docs.summary:
The `wix-media-backend` module contains functionality for working with
 media from backend code.
description: To use the Media API, import `wixMedia` from the `wix-media-backend` module:

docs.summary:
The `mediaManager` module contains functionality for working with
 the media that is stored in your site's [Media Manager](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-the-media-manager-568956).
description: You can use the Media Manager API to upload or import files to your Media Manager, or get information about an existing
>**Note:** In the Media Manager, `fileName` refers to a unique string given to every file in the Media Manager. It is located

in the Media Manager inside the URL of your media file. To learn more, see [Creating a URL for a media file or The truth about getFileURL] (https://www.wix.com/velo/forum/tips-tutorials-examples/creating-a-url-for-a-media-file-or-the-truth-about-getfileurl).
To use the Media Manager API, import `mediaManager` from the `wix-media-backend` module:
